ygData.subject: Re: Charming wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: heh heh the charm wears off and both wisps turn your enchanter to wisp dust ... From: Scott Murawski [mailto:scott@speechworks.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 02,
ygData.messageBody:
heh heh the charm wears off and both wisps turn your enchanter to wisp dust

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Murawski [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:37 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Charming wisps


From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>

>> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>>
>> Only some wisps do magical damage. I did just what you are suggesting one
>> time, and the wisp I charmed did not have the magical attack, so the
other
>> wisp ate him for lunch!

So what happens if you just HAPPENED to have that non-magical attack wisp
to attack another
non-magical attack wisp? You'll have a standoff. I wonder if the game
will actually allow that
and if so, what happens?

Azboklin the enchanter who is now counting down the hours till he's level
12...
hehe, the first step is leaving work - can't i just mesmerize everyone in
the office?
